content.rendered:
Farmkart Foods

Leveraging Tech to grow Poultry and Fish

Learn More

Faster

Cheaper

Sweeter

Affordable

Secure

What We Offer

Healthy
Poultry and Fish

Leveraging technology, we provide low to mid-income earners in urban cities with accessible, affordable and quality poultry and fish produce to their doorstep to ensure they are well-fed and energized to live their lives and build their dreams.

Fishery

We grow fresh, high-quality & delicious catfish straight from the farm to the consumers’ kitchen.

Learn More

Poultry

We produce and process by-products from poultry (chicken meat & eggs) to locally meet the available demand.

Learn More

Consultation

We train early-stage poultry and catfish farmers to run profitable and sustainable farms.
Book a Session

Community

Join our vibrant community of Farmkart enthusiasts, popularly called Kartans.

Connect

About us

Fresh From Our Farm, With Love

  • Who We Are
  • Our Vision
  • Our Mission

Farmkart Foods is an agri-tech company leveraging technology to grow sustainable products and by-products of poultry and fish. We deliver it from the farm to our customer's doorstep efficiently.

Our vision is to build a 360 degree technology-driven livestock farm and inspire the adaptation of tech livestock farming in Nigeria. 

Our mission is to optimise the entire value chain to make fish and poultry production sustainable, more accessible and affordable to Africans. A place where people can find livestock produce nutured specially for them.

Partners

Hear From Our Customers

I love farmkart because they are transparent, have integrity and are reliable.
Maureen Ogunade
Farmkart is a farmer-friendly and consumer-oriented agritech. I love the brand vision, use of tech for agriculture and growth over time. The consistently deliver.​
Rufus Oyemade
Farmkart always delivers on their promise. It’s amazinggggggg! I trust the team and I trust Farmkart
Blessing Abeng
I love farmkart because they are transparent, have integrity and are reliable.


Maureen Ogunade
Farmkart is a farmer-friendly and consumer-oriented agritech. I love the brand vision, use of tech for agriculture and growth over time. The consistently deliver.​
Rufus Oyemade
Farmkart is one of the first platforms that empowers farmers in such a unique way. I love the brand.

Oluwaseun
Farmkart always delivers on their promise. It’s amazinggggggg! I trust the team and I trust Farmkart


Blessing Abeng
